Chief Plenipotentiary Oncologist of the Ministry of Natural ResourcesAndrei CaprinI told you.“Russian newspaper”The most popular and dangerous myths about cancer.

The first myth relates to the belief that there is one“chudo-analysis”
Launched the final phase of the Star Multidimensional Engineering OlympicsYesterday 8:00.0
The final round is held from 3 February to 23 March 2024.

As noted by the First Vice-President of the Russian Union of EngineersVladimir Gutenevthe second phase will be more complex but interesting. Olympiad not only opens up new opportunities when it comes to ties, but also helps to choose engineering careers.trajectory diagrams
On 6 February, more than 20 houses will remain without heatingYesterday 7:00.0
On 6 February, from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m., heating and hot water will cease to be supplied to residential homes in connection with repairs to the heating appliances of Column No.13 and Column No. 15:

- The street of Zverev,Houses .
In a week, more than 1,000 munitions were removed by the PskovsYesterday 18:00.0
From 21 January to 4 February, 54 citizen security checks were carried out by members of the Rosgvardiya licensing and clearance units in Pskov province.

The Rosgvardians identified 9 administrative offences, seized 21 weapons and 1,104 munitions.

Synoptics warn of a hololady in Pskov province on TuesdayYesterday 5:30.0
According to pskovic synoptics, the region is expected to have clouds with explanations of weather on 6 February. A little snow. There's a holoid on the roads.

Winds between 5 and 10 m/s.

Temperature in the Great Lukas for 24 hours - 2... - 6 oC.
The great Lukas passed the Championate and the Pskov Region First on the IMAYesterday 5:00.0
The great Lukas have passed the Championate and the Pskov Region First on the MMA. The tournament was attended by more than 50 people from Pskov, Pitalovo, the Great Luc.

From the competition, the location was as follows:in terms of
Tomorrow, the Great Lukas are planning to disconnect water.Yesterday 4:30.0
On 6 February, cold water is scheduled to be cut off in the Great Lukas. This is related to emergency repairs on the plumbing.

According to Vodokanal, from 9 a.m. to the end of the work, the water will be shut off at No.19 on Nerasov Street and at Houses No. 10; 11; 12 on the coast of L. Schmidt.
An exhibition on Alexander Matrosov ' s century was opened at the Krajevos MuseumYesterday 4:00.06 photos
On 5 February, the Great Lukas celebrated the 100th anniversary of the birth of the hero of the Soviet UnionAlexandra Matrosova.The opening of an exhibition devoted to theA memorable date diagrams
It became known that the most important thing was in the Pskov region stores in a week.Yesterday, 15:30.0
In the telegram.ProbiZeneWith reference to Pskovstat, they said that the most important thing was the Pskov region stores in a week. Thus, the five most expensive products, according to Pskovstat, included fresh cucumbers. The increase over the previous week was 110.63%. The average cost is 276rubles diagrams
Aleksandr Matrosov ' s 100-year postal stamp went to the Great LukasYesterday, 3:00.0video video
Postal stamp specialization event on the 100th anniversary of the birth of the hero of the Soviet UnionAlexandra Matrosova, took place at the Creved City Museum of the Great Lucky.

Specialists were: the representative of the Post of Russia, Vasiliy Littleev, Deputy Governor of Pskov RegionVera EmelianovFirst Deputy Head of the City of the GreatSvetlana StepanovHead of Administrationtowns

info.title: Oncologist has spread popular and dangerous myths about cancer.
info.short_text:
Andrei Kakrin, the main external oncologist of the Ministry of Natural Resources of Russia, presented the “Russian newspaper” of the most popular and dangerous myths of cancer.

The first myth relates to the belief that there is one " chao-analysis " within the circles

info.title: Launched the final phase of the Star Multidimensional Engineering Olympics
info.short_text:
The final round is held from 3 February to 23 March 2024.

As noted by the First Vice-President of the Russian Union of Engineers, Vladimir Gutenev, the second phase will be more complex but interesting. Olympiad not only opens new opportunities on entry into the ties, but also helps to select engineering career trajectories within the circles.

info.title: Tomorrow, the Great Lukas are planning to disconnect water.
info.short_text:
On 6 February, cold water is scheduled to be cut off in the Great Lukas. This is related to emergency repairs on the plumbing.

According to Vodokanal, from 9 a.m. to the end of the work, the water will be shut off at No.19 on Nerasov Street and at Houses No. 10; 11; 12 on the coast of L. Schmidt.

info.title: An exhibition on Alexander Matrosov ' s century was opened at the Krajevos Museum
info.short_text: On 5 February, the Great Lukas celebrated the 100th anniversary of the birth of the hero of the Soviet Union, Alexander Matrosov. The opening of an exhibition on the commemorative date of the Circumstances was held at the Grand Luk Museum

info.title: It became known that the most important thing was in the Pskov region stores in a week.
info.short_text: In ProbiZnes Telegram, with reference to Pskovstat, they said that the most important thing was in Pskov province stores in a week. Thus, the five most expensive products, according to Pskovstat, included fresh cucumbers. The increase over the previous week was 110.63%. The cost is an average of 276 roubles diagrams

info.title: Aleksandr Matrosov ' s 100-year postal stamp went to the Great Lukas
info.short_text:
An event on the specialization of the postal stamp on the 100th anniversary of the birth of the hero of the Soviet Union, Alexandre Matrosov, took place at the Creved City Museum of the City of the Great Luki.

Specialists were: the representative of the Post of Russia, Vasiliy Littleev, Vice-President of the Pskov Region, Vera Emelianov, First Deputy Head of the City of the Great Luki Svetlana Stepanov, Head of the City ' s Administration.
